thread.title: Jersey 22nd most expensive place for taxis
thread.title_full: Jersey 22nd most expensive place for taxis | Channel - ITV News

author: itv.com
title: Jersey 22nd most expensive place for taxis
text:
Statistics from Transport and Technical Services show that Jersey is the 22nd most expensive place to get a taxi.
That's out of 364 areas in the UK; London Heathrow came top for cost.
It comes as major reforms are being made to taxi regulations on the island.
Taxi's and cabs will have a maximum chargeable price when the changes come into place.
TTS graph showing fare costs, October 2013 Credit: TTS graph, October 2013 Last updated Tue 29 Sep 2015 Read more 3 updates Major reforms to Jersey's taxi industry Travel Jersey
